page.title: 03A DAY IN MY LIFE
page.content: I NORMALLY WAKE AT ABOUT SIX FORTY FIVE . I GET DRESSED AND GO DOWN STAIRS WHERE MAX MY DOG STANDS TO GREET ME. I GO INTO THE LOUNGE AND TURN THE T.V ON WHILE MUM TAKES DAD TO WORK IN THE CAR. I WATCH POPEYE ON T.V. WHEN THAT HAS FINISHED I TAKE MAX FOR HIS MORNING WALK. THEN I HAVE MY BREAKFAST OF MILK AND CEREAL. IT IS NOW TIME FOR SCHOOL AND I WAIT FOR MY FRIEND MARTIN. WE WALK TO SCHOOL TOGETHER. IT IS A QUARTER TO NINE WHEN WE REACH SCHOOL.WE SIT DOWN AND GET ON WITH MATHS. LATER WE DO ENGLISH. AT A QUARTER TO ELEVEN WE GO OUT TO PLAY. WE OFTEN PLAY CRICKET WITH MR MARSH AND WE SOMETIMES PLAY ON THE CLIMBING FRAME AND WE COME BACK IN AT ELEVEN O CLOCK.WE THEN GET ON WITH S.R.A CARDS OR R.E OR TOPIC WORK UNTIL TWELVE O CLOCK WHEN WE HAVE DINNER.AFTER
